trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a list or outline.
trans-unit.target: 表示在列表或大纲中的项。

trans-unit.source: A ListItemStructure can only be a child of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure"></xref> class.
Adds a block to a list item.
The block to add.
The element is .
Gets or sets the name of the numeral, character, or bullet symbol for the list item as it appears in the formatting markup of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数字、 字符或项目符号列表项的名称，因为它将显示在文档的格式设置的标记。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure> mirrors a set of items, usually short paragraphs, that are actually formatted as a list in the `<FixedPage>` part of a document's markup.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>镜像一组项，通常为短格式的段落，实际为中的列表`<FixedPage>`文档的标记的一部分。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>

trans-unit.source: Typically, each item in the list is formatted with a marker such as a numeral, character, or bullet.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，列表中的每个项被加上如数字、 字符或项目符号的标记。

trans-unit.source: The marker could also be multiple characters or even an image.
trans-unit.target: 标记也可以是多个字符或者甚至图像。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Marker property is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> attribute of the element, in the `<FixedPage>` part of a document's markup, that specifies what that marker is.
trans-unit.target: 标记属性的值是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>元素的特性，请在`<FixedPage>`属于文档的标记，用于指定哪些标记有效值。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the marker element specifies the numeral 3 as the marker for a list item and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> of that element is 'ThirdItem', then the Marker property of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> that mirrors the list item should be set to 'ThirdItem.'
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该标记元素对<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>该元素的是 ThirdItem，然后<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>，镜像列表项应设置为 ThirdItem。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>的标记属性</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>和列表项标记为指定数字 3

trans-unit.source: If a list item has a marker, failing to reference the marker with the Marker property of the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> may force applications that are consuming the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> to display or print the marker at the end of the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表项都有一个标记，无法引用与相应的标记属性标记<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>可能会强制应用程序正在消耗<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>来显示或打印文档的结尾处的标记。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> marking list item.
To be added.
This method has not been implemented.
Always raises <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>.

Typically, a child of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure>, but it can be a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.FigureStructure>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure>, or a (nested) <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，子级<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>是<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure>，但它会<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.FigureStructure>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure>，或一 （嵌套） <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure>。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.FigureStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ParagraphStructure> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.ListItemStructure>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref:System.Object> that is added.
value is not one of the types that can be a child of this class.
trans-unit.target: value不是可以是此类的子级的类型。

trans-unit.source: See **Remarks**.
Not implemented.
Not used.
